Package com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.history

API for storing and retrieving flow trace information, in the form of FlowEvents emitted during flow execution.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EventDataSerialiser<T>
    Serialises event data (scratchpad contents, flow results, and exceptions) to a common type for storage/representation purposes.
    FlowEvent<T>
    An event that has occurred during flow execution.
    FlowEventRepository<T>  
    FlowEventStore<T>
    A store of flow events.
    FlowEventTranslator<T,V>
    Translates flow events into some other type.
    FlowHistory<T>
    Represents the entire history of a flow's execution.
    FlowHistoryRepository<T>
    A repository which stores the TraceMap and history of FlowEvents for executed flows.
    StepFailedEvent<T>  
    StepStartedEvent<T>  
    StepSucceededEvent<T>  
    TraceMapRepository
    A repository which stores TraceMaps for flows.

Package com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.history Description

API for storing and retrieving flow trace information, in the form of FlowEvents emitted during flow execution.
